results.title: Antineoplastic effects of simvastatin in experimental breast cancer.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Basic parameters of experimental @<m>DISEASE_Carcinogenesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@carcinogenesis@@@ after long-term @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment in animals were assessed.

results.title: Role of simvastatin in tumor lymphangiogenesis and lymph node metastasis.
results.text_hl: Analysis of lymphatic size, area fraction, and lymphatic vessel density showed tissue specificity and variation to @<m>DISEASE_Carcinogenesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@melanoma carcinogenesis@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated group compared with the untreated group.

results.title: Immunohistochemical and histomorphological analysis of rat mammary tumors after simvastatin treatment.
results.text_hl: In this study, the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on selected parameters of apoptosis and proliferation in chemocarcinogen-induced @<m>DISEASE_Carcinogenesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@mammary tumorigenesis@@@ in female @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were determined.

results.title: Therapeutic effect of simvastatin on DMBA-induced breast cancer in mice.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Tamoxifen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013629 @@@Tamoxifen@@@ and high dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ improved parameters of @<m>DISEASE_Carcinogenesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@mammary carcinogenesis@@@ including mean @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ volume, body weight and percent of mortality as compared to @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast tumors@@@ without treatment (D1).

results.title: Effect of survivin downregulation by simvastatin on the growth and invasion of salivary adenoid cystic carcinoma
results.text_hl: The majority of reports concerning @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment in the majority of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancers@@@ have demonstrated that survivin is significantly decreased as a result and has been implicated in @<m>DISEASE_Carcinogenesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@tumorigenesis@@@.

results.title: Prevention of radiation-induced mammary tumors.
results.journal: Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys
results.text_hl: From the results, estrogen itself or @GENE_PRL @GENE_24683 @@@prolactin@@@ induced by estrogen may be a promoter for the @<m>DISEASE_Carcinogenesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@tumorigenesis@@@. @CHEMICAL_Bezafibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001629 @@@Bezafibrate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, agents inducing @DISEASE_Hypobetalipoproteinemia_Familial_2 @DISEASE_MESH:C565732 @@@hypolipidemia@@@ and hypocholesterolemia respectively, cause a decrease in the @CHEMICAL_Diethylstilbestrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004054 @@@DES@@@-dependent promotion of @DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Carcinogenesis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@tumorigenesis@@@.
